handle

Storage for transmitter PHY.
pRxPhy

Status error code.
Read current transmitter PHY and receive PHY.

allPhys
All PHYs preferences.
txPhys
Preferred transmitter PHYs.
rxPhys
Preferred receiver PHYs.
Status error code.
Specify the preferred values for the transmitter PHY and receiver PHY to be used for all subsequent connections over the LE transport.

briefdescription.para: Validate if specified PHYs are supported by LL.

simplesect.para: true if all specified PHYs are supported.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t handle, uint8_t allPhys, uint8_t txPhys, uint8_t rxPhys, uint16_t phyOptions)
memberdef.name: LlSetPhy

detaileddescription.para:
handle
Connection handle.
allPhys
All PHYs preferences.
txPhys
Preferred transmitter PHYs.
rxPhys
Preferred receiver PHYs.
phyOptions
PHY options.
Status error code.
Set PHY preferences for a given connection. The controller might not be able to make the change (e.g., because the peer does not support the requested PHY) or may decide that the current PHY is preferable.
